name: The Enthralling Realms
description: Hobbit Village was once a peaceful place, but tragedy struck when a hobbit named Sam found a magical artifact. Unintentionally plunging the village into a terrible war, Sam became hated and despised by his friends and neighbors. Now the war is over, but the village still blames Sam.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 75 MB available space Sound Card: Standard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 75 MB available space Sound Card: Standard
